question_text: How does centralized storage benefit file sharing in enterprise environments?
answer_options: It assigns hostnames to shared folders
It ensures files are accessed anonymously
It allows consistent access and backup of data from a single location
It forces all users to use the same operating system
correct_answer: It allows consistent access and backup of data from a single location
explanation: Centralized storage simplifies access, permissions, and backups by keeping all files in one central system.
